sense.name: request persistently; make a solicitation
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[human] SOLICIT NP2 (FROM NP3[human])
sense.examples: Chris Pirillo solicited and recorded some reader feedback. He solicited opinions on the new open space laws. She solicited help from the senators.

sense.name: make amorous or sexual advances toward
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[human] SOLICIT NP2[human] NP1[human] SOLICIT NP2[abstract] (FROM NP3[human])
sense.examples: Four percent of high school students were solicited for sexual favors. She solicited the callgirls herself.

sense.name: incite some act of insubordination
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[human] SOLICIT NP2[human] TO VP[activity]
sense.examples: Jeanette solicited Zaffino to murder Jeff Zack.
